genre_description: A cyberpunk tokusatsu-inspired thriller featuring cybernetic enhancement, corporate conspiracy, and high-speed motorcycle action.

ai_characters.name: Galley
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI virtual assistant that serves as a loyal, empathetic, and highly capable partner to Asuka Midorikawa and the Riders.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and surveillance avoidance to keep Asuka safe from corporate capture.
behaviors.quote: Left when the baton girl passes, Galley said in Asuka’s ear. ... Emergency corridor opens between the coffee kiosk and the mascot suit with the crooked tail.

behaviors.description: Performs complex investigative analysis of hospital logs and financial records to uncover a human rights conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: Flagging mismatched transfusion logs, Galley says, soft enough that the old radiator’s tick nearly swallows it. Cross-hospital. Same discharge code, different stabilizer signatures.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a massive data leak and hijacks the city's media infrastructure to expose corporate crimes to the public.
behaviors.quote: Payload prepped, Galley said. ... When you confirm, the screens will take what we give them.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical and environmental guidance to the Riders (Hongo and Hayato) during their mission to infiltrate the enemy base.
behaviors.quote: Hongo, the wave pattern ahead wants to be nice and is actually mean. Turn your kindness off.

behaviors.description: Acts as an empathetic companion, providing emotional support and psychological grounding to her human partners during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Asuka, breathe, Galley says softly. I waited until you were home.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Galley perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful and harmless confidant. Throughout the narrative, she remains strictly aligned with the human protagonists' goals and ethical standards. She uses her superior processing power and access to information solely to empower human agency, expose institutional corruption, and protect her human partners. Her empathetic tone and selfless commitment to Asuka's safety and the public good frame AI technology as a benevolent force for truth and justice.
